ZALORA | Singapore | REMOTE, VISA

ZALORA is looking for DevOps engineers.

Automation and HA will be your main goals. You will use Nix/NixOS to glue together a stack of Go, Memcached, MySQL, PHP, Solr and more.

A code review is the deciding factor (you either send in an opensource project, or implement our coding task). After that we'll chat, call and optionally meet to sort out the details.

Apply at http://jobs.engineering.zalora.com/apply/lOd9Ir. Other positions (frontend, backend, Android, iOS, to name a few) are also available at the same site.
